name: Dollface

next_episode_to_air.name: Chapter one: The beginning of the end
next_episode_to_air.overview: The first few days the teenagers spend isolated in the mysterious Salem lodge go smoothly, but Aega's strange new illness grows worse.

overview: When a group of teenagers are trapped in a lodge by a mask wearing madman, they realise their only chance at escape might be a quiet eight year old girl from another dimension with a dark and troubled past.

seasons.name: season 1
seasons.overview: A group of teenagers are trapped in a mysterious lodge by a masked mad man, with their only chance at escape being the strange powers of an elusive eight year old girl.
